name: pff team grades next week opponent
expected_query: with "next_week_opponents" as (select "h" as "nfl_team", "v" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "week" = ${constants.current_season.calculate_week(constants.current_season.now.add(1, 'week')).week} and "seas_type" = 'REG' union select "v" as "nfl_team", "h" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "week" = ${constants.current_season.calculate_week(constants.current_season.now.add(1, 'week')).week} and "seas_type" = 'REG') select "player"."pid", tc1887fa0ef9d7a394bdece79e31733b6.grades_defense as pff_team_grades_defense_0, "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "next_week_opponents" on "player"."current_nfl_team" = "next_week_opponents"."nfl_team" left join "pff_team_seasonlogs" as "tc1887fa0ef9d7a394bdece79e31733b6" on "tc1887fa0ef9d7a394bdece79e31733b6"."nfl_team" = "next_week_opponents"."opponent" and "tc1887fa0ef9d7a394bdece79e31733b6"."year" = 2024 where player.pos IN ('TEAM') group by tc1887fa0ef9d7a394bdece79e31733b6.grades_defense, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
